Choosing instance types for Amazon Neptune

Amazon Neptune is a service that offers a number of different instance sizes and families.
Amazon Neptune instance sizes and families offer different capabilities suited to different graph workloads.
The section about choosing instance types for Amazon Neptune is meant to help users choose the best instance type for their needs.
Each instance-type in Amazon Neptune families has pricing information.
The pricing information for Amazon Neptune instance-types is available on the Neptune pricing page.
The Neptune pricing page is located at https://aws.amazon.com/neptune/pricing/.
